name: The Penguin Chronicles
description:
The Penguin Chronicles is a third-person puzzle game where the player is transported into the world of Penguin books classics such as 'Murder on the Orient Express' 'The Night Circus' and 'The Little Prince'. Players must solve puzzles related to each story and collect pages to repair more books and unlock new stories!

As this is a demo, the only level currently implemented is 'Murder on the Orient Express'
